basics.name: Sai Sambhu Prasad Kalaga
basics.label: AI/ML Engineer & Data Scientist
basics.summary: AI Engineer and Data Scientist with a strong background in Computer Science. Experienced in building intelligence platforms, RAG pipelines, and ML models. Passionate about leveraging AI to solve complex problems.

education.studyType: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science

work.name: iLink Digital
highlights: Built an intelligence platform with multiple specialized agents orchestrated via LangGraph supervisor pattern, handling complex queries through AI-driven routing and response synthesis through OpenAI and Gemini. Implemented dual-pipeline system combining structured CSV queries with FAISS-based vector search over unstructured PDF documents, ensuring zero-hallucination responses through strict tool-based data retrieval.

Conducted comprehensive performance analysis across Llama4 vs Qwen3, and Llama 3.2 (3B) vs Qwen 2.5 (7B) models, measuring TPS (tokens-per-second), GPU VRAM utilization (4/8/16-bit quantization), and multi-query batch processing latency. Architected scalable FastAPI backend with Streamlit frontend (STT/TTS), Docker containerization, and OpenAI Evals integration for automated response quality assessment.

work.name: Southern Methodist University
work.position: Data Science Researcher- AI and ML
highlights: Derived 50+ features from VR surgical training data; trained a Random Forest reaching 95% validation accuracy; deployed with Streamlit; benchmarked XGBoost and LSTM; shipped instructor dashboards that shortened review time by 50%; analysis revealed that students who reflected about every 2 days outperformed peers, an insight the professor adopted across classes to boost engagement and outcomes.

Automated storage and analysis of a large municipal Police Department VR training data (Python, cloud storage) with schema checks, metadata versioning, and scheduled ETL; decreased manual handling by 70% and cut time to insight from 2 days to 2 hours.

work.name: Blue Clay Health
work.position: Full Stack, NLP and ML Engineering Intern
highlights: Designed and deployed enterprise-grade RAG and semantic-search pipelines using Python, FastAPI, FAISS, and Azure Blob Storage, optimizing ingestion and retrieval workflows to cut high-percentile latency by 35% and boost clinical insight accuracy by 28%.

Scaled microservice architecture on GCP (Cloud Run, Artifact Registry, Cloud Build) and led Azure-to-GCP migration, enabling cross-team access, faster delivery, and full-stack integration with LLM-driven workflows, automated draft generation, and intelligent summarization.

work.name: Indian School of Business (ISB)
highlights: Automated table extraction (pandas, docx2python)  from corporate reports (Thousands of Fortune 500 companies’ annual reports) into structured datasets; built Streamlit ML/NLP demos; presented to 50+ business students, improving comprehension 20%.

work.name: TextHappen (a digital marketing startup)
highlights: Owned full stack feature delivery for a marketing platform, collaborating with frontend engineers and analysts; shipped HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Python services that enhanced UX. Modelled user behavior with Python, ML and scikit-learn to guide campaigns, lifting click-through rate by 25% and enabling data-driven decisions.

work.name: Google
highlights: Spearheaded a 1,200+ member community; organized workshops and hands-on sessions across Web, Data, Android, Google Cloud, AI/ML, Flutter, and Dialogflow CX.

projects.name: CUDA Accelerated Explainable AI for Heart and Chest X-ray Diagnostics
projects.description: Implemented a CUDA accelerated system for dual diagnostics using CNNs on chest X-rays and MLP on tabular indicators, reaching 98.7% validation accuracy. Integrated SHAP and Gemini to generate natural-language rationale in a Streamlit interface for Users.
highlights: Implemented a CUDA accelerated system for dual diagnostics using CNNs on chest X-rays and MLP on tabular indicators, reaching 98.7% validation accuracy. Integrated SHAP and Gemini to generate natural-language rationale in a Streamlit interface for Users.

projects.name: Detecting Out-of-Tune Instruments with Audio Deep Learning (VGGish)
projects.description: Trained CNN and MLP models with VGGish embeddings and mel-spectrograms in TensorFlow, delivering 81% test accuracy on a custom NSynth dataset. Synthesized 300K+ augmented audio clips with Librosa.
highlights: Trained CNN and MLP models with VGGish embeddings and mel-spectrograms in TensorFlow, delivering 81% test accuracy on a custom NSynth dataset. Synthesized 300K+ augmented audio clips with Librosa.

projects.name: SMUBot - a RAG-based Chatbot for International Student Assistance
projects.description: Developed a RAG chatbot using Gemini LLM and FAISS semantic search, shortening response time by 70% and attaining 98% answer accuracy on FAQs. Optimized PDF ingestion and indexing with Python and Transformers, reducing retrieval latency by 80%.
highlights: Developed a RAG chatbot using Gemini LLM and FAISS semantic search, shortening response time by 70% and attaining 98% answer accuracy on FAQs. Optimized PDF ingestion and indexing with Python and Transformers, reducing retrieval latency by 80%.

awards.title: Published ML-based object detection research in a UGC-approved journal (2023).
Awarded 1st place in IBM’s AI/ML Hackathon among 50+ teams.
